content: As an AI language model, I cannot provide medical advice. However, feeling full quickly after meals could be a symptom of an underlying medical condition, such as gastroparesis, indigestion or certain gastrointestinal disorders. It is recommended that you consult a doctor if you are experiencing this symptom regularly or if you are experiencing any other symptoms that concern you. Your doctor will be able to provide you with a proper diagnosis, and suggest appropriate treatment if needed.
